lines.text: There is no longer any place for Mrs. Collins.

[to Quentin]
We're rare people, you and I. Not only have we lived before, but we are fortunate enough to remember.
I don't know why, I almost feel I've come home again...

[about Carlotta]
She makes me feel as if she invited us here.
Bring the painting to life, Charles.
There's someone else in that room, isn't there?

[about Gerald]
Crazy sonofabitch, he almost killed me!
